website_summaries.verdict: Treat yourself to this luxurious set of massage stones, which help promote circulation and eliminate swelling.
pros: Set comes with eight stones for your feet or arms, four for your legs, and four for your back
Stones are thick and durable to provide  deep, effective massage
cons: A higher price point compared to other brands

website_summaries.verdict: High-end massages stones provide spa-like results at home.
pros: Reviews highlight the size and density of the stones that are designed for arm, leg, and back massage
We also like that you don't need a custom device to heat the stones
cons: A heating guide would help those new to hot stone therapy

customer_reviews.title: Great massage stones!
customer_reviews.text: I love these hot stone, they are easy to heat up and they glide effortlessly across the skin. The weight of them are just right because they hit pressure points without effort!
customer_reviews.author: Mizani Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Nice, solid, grounding stones. I'm a massage therapist using them on my clients. I switched from salt stones because you can't really clean salt. My clients love them. The small stones are not useful to me, but maybe aestheticians can use them. The only thing I wish the set had is a more pointed tool, like the shape of a pestle, for trigger points.
customer_reviews.author: at home in nature

customer_reviews.title: Spa quality
customer_reviews.text: These hold in the heat great and they are very smooth! Perfect for massages.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy2girls

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the quality !!!! Definitely worth it and would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Luiza

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I warm them in the Crock-Pot and use them on my.husband who has RA and the deep heat is great! They hold thier heat quite well.
customer_reviews.author: laura briguglio

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great rocks bigger than imAgined but they hold more heat than I thought they would!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice stones, I do not have a warmer yet ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice stones, I do not have a warmer yet so I can not tell you how they retain the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Beekeeper

customer_reviews.title: First time using the stones for a massage and my client didn’t love it but didn’t hate it either.
customer_reviews.text: I gave the stones a 3 in my review because I was unsure of the results. It was an ok experience and this was my first time using stones in a massage as I am a newly licensed massage therapist. The stones did heat up easily in my hot towel cabinet but I’m not sure the stones held the heat longer enough. I’ll have to keep trying and maybe update my review.
customer_reviews.author: LE/LMT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Nice and thick! These are the perfect sizes for my hands. My husband has chronic back pain and I wanted to do something nice for him this year by giving him regular massages. I put these on a towel in the crockpot and heated the rocks up on high. Then dropped them in an ice bath for a few seconds and went to work. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Moore

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good set of stones to work with I've used multiple ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good set of stones to work with I've used multiple times with great success just don't get him too hot takes awhile for it to cool off
customer_reviews.author: william cornett

customer_reviews.title: Has strange waxy coating
customer_reviews.text: The stones are uniform in size and texture and arrived well packaged. They're smooth and well proportioned however there's a weird coating on them similar to car wax? Perhaps it's to reduce friction while in use but that's what massage oil is for. Also the stones had the design of the bubble wrap on them and it doesn't come off when washed with hot soapy water. I'm hoping washing them a few more times will remove it.
customer_reviews.author: A Dobbs

customer_reviews.title: They are amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: They are amazing!!!! Warms perfectly!!!! and last for very long!!!!! I am very pleased and happy! Excellent quality excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what she wanted!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in law was so excited to get these and will be using them for her business.
customer_reviews.author: Honey:)

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for a professional masseur who studied ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a professional masseur who studied in Indonesia. He was excited to receive them and decided to use them in his practice..
customer_reviews.author: margaret weatherbee

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They are working well and getting used to working with them.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great deal & easy to use on skin. smooth and stable. holds temperature well for a while.
customer_reviews.author: navichan

customer_reviews.title: It would have been nice to have a card or something describing the uses/ ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and it came in a box with no instructions or anything about the rocks. It would have been nice to have a card or something describing the uses/ benefits etc. Also, the rocks didn't stay warm very long. I had them in my pot at 136 degreed for over an hour, so they should have been ready to go. The only positive for me was that they were smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Emil S.
